argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvhvbase.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | dvhvbase.t | |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | dvhvbase.e | |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | dvhvbase.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | dvhvbase.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 6 |  | #P_opelxpi | |- ( ( F e. T /\ S e. E ) -> <. F , S >. e. ( T X. E ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ S e. E ) ) -> <. F , S >. e. ( T X. E ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_dvhvbase | |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> V = ( T X. E ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ S e. E ) ) -> V = ( T X. E ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ S e. E ) ) -> <. F , S >. e. V ) |
